meanings.definition: Capable of being filled with air or gas to become larger and more rigid.
meanings.sent1: The inflatable pool float was easy to blow up.
meanings.sent2: The inflatable mattress provided a comfortable place to sleep.
meanings.sent3: The inflatable beach ball bounced around in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness was like an inflatable balloon, expanding with each good news.
meanings.sent5: The inflatable castle at the fair was a huge hit with the kids.

meanings.definition: A device or structure that can be filled with air or gas to make it larger and more rigid.
meanings.sent1: We brought an inflatable kayak for our river adventure.
meanings.sent2: The inflatable tent was easy to set up for the camping trip.
meanings.sent3: The inflatable life raft saved them when their boat sank.
meanings.sent4: His ego was like an inflatable, always needing praise to stay afloat.
meanings.sent5: The inflatable slide at the party kept the children entertained for hours.
